name: Secret Agent Eddie [MOONMOON_OW Jam]
description:
Secret Agent Eddie is an Enter the Gungeon inspired shooter. Eddie has been called upon for an important mission: Save the god gamer from the evil cloning corporation Zodcorp. Defeat his goons and mutants and get the god gamer back safely

Gameplay Instructions:
Shoot and kill all enemies in a room before continuing to the next.

Extra info:
Press F1 to restart in case you get stuck or fall through the level.

Secret Agent Eddie is a game made during the MOONMOON_OW Discord game jam.This game was made possible by:

  • Elephante12
  • loquacity (https://www.artstation.com/loquacity)
  • Ratkid (https://www.arenblondal.com/)
  • Summer (https://www.artstation.com/sum3t )
  • Yamil (https://yamil.io/)
  • Zod
